得.definition: to have to; must; ought to; to need to

得不償失.definition: the gains do not make up for the losses (idiom)

得中.definition: (as in an imperial examination) to be a successful candidate; to draw a winning ticket (in a lottery)

得主.definition: recipient (of an award); winner (in a competition)

得令.definition: to follow your orders; roger!; yessir!

得以.definition: able to; so that sb can; enabling; in order to; finally in a position to; with sth in view

得便.definition: at one's convenience; when one has time

得便宜賣乖.definition: to have benefited from sth but pretend otherwise; to claim to be hard done by, even though one has benefited

得出.definition: to obtain (a result); to arrive at (a conclusion)

得分.definition: to score a point (in a competition, test etc); score; rating; grade

得到.definition: to get; to obtain; to receive

得勢.definition: to win power; to get authority; to become dominant

得名.definition: to get one's name; named (after sth)

得天獨厚.definition: blessed by heaven (idiom); enjoying exceptional advantages; favored by nature

得失.definition: gains and losses; success and failure; merits and demerits

得寸進尺.definition: lit. win an inch, want a foot (idiom); fig. not satisfied with small gains; give him an inch, and he'll want a mile

得心應手.definition: lit. what the heart wishes, the hand accomplishes (idiom) skilled at the job; entirely in one's element; going smoothly and easily

得悉.definition: to learn about; to be informed

得意.definition: proud of oneself; pleased with oneself; complacent

得意忘形.definition: so pleased as to lose one's sense of measure; beside oneself with joy

得意揚揚.definition: variant of 得意洋洋[de2 yi4 yang2 yang2]

得意洋洋.definition: joyfully satisfied; to be immensely proud of oneself; proudly; an air of complacency

得手.definition: to go smoothly; to come off; to succeed

得榮.definition: Dêrong county (Tibetan: sde rong rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州|甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)

得榮縣.definition: Dêrong county (Tibetan: sde rong rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)

得標.definition: to win a bid; to win a trophy in a contest; (jokingly) to get an STD

得氣.definition: "to obtain qi", the sensation of electrical tingling, numbness, soreness etc at the meridian where accupuncture needle is inserted

得法.definition: (doing sth) in the right way; suitable; properly

得病.definition: to fall ill; to contract a disease

得直.definition: (HK, Sg) (law) to have one's appeal allowed; to win an appeal

得知.definition: to find out; to learn of

得罪.definition: to offend sb; to make a faux pas; a faux pas; see also 得罪[de2 zui4]

得而復失.definition: to lose what one has just obtained (idiom)

得誌.definition: to accomplish one's ambition; a dream come true; to enjoy success

得逞.definition: to prevail; to have one's way; to get away with it

得過且過.definition: satisfied just to get through (idiom); to muddle through; without high ambitions, but getting by

得道.definition: to achieve the Dao; to become an immortal

得道多助.definition: a just cause enjoys abundant support (idiom); those upholding justice will find help all around

得道多助，失道寡助.pinyin: dé dào duō zhù ， shī dào guǎ zhù
得道多助，失道寡助.definition: A just cause attracts much support, an unjust one finds little (idiom, from Mencius)

得隴望蜀.definition: lit. covet Sichuan once Gansu has been seized; fig. endless greed; insatiable desire

得饒人處且饒人.pinyin: dé ráo rén chù qiě ráo rén
得饒人處且饒人.definition: where it is possible to let people off, one should spare them (idiom); anyone can make mistakes, forgive them when possible

得魚忘筌.definition: lit. catch fish then forget the trap (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3]); fig. to take help for granted
